about_the_game:
About the Game

Welcome to Vinyl Drop, the ultimate game for music lovers and collectors!

🎶 What’s the game?
Tap, collect, and trade virtual vinyl records. Spin your way through a world of rare finds, legendary albums, and a community that lives for the groove!

🛒 How to Play:

  • Collect Vinyls – Open random drops every few hours.

  • Trade & Upgrade – Use the Steam Marketplace to trade with other players. Build your dream collection.

  • Discover Rarity – Every drop is a chance at Common, Rare, or Legendary vinyls.

Show Your Style – Use your collection to unlock themed levels inspired by your records.

Rarity Chances:

🎵 Common – 72%

🎵 Uncommon – 20%
🎵 Rare – 7%
🎵 Epic – 0.9%
🎵 Legendary – 0.1%

Will you be the one to score the ultimate Legendary vinyl?

Features:

  • 🎧 Inventory Drops – Open random vinyls every 2 hours!

  • 💿 Marketplace Trading – Trade with others to complete your set (Steam only).

  • 🎨 Community Designs – Submit vinyl designs via Discord. Your art could be the next drop!

  • 🎶 Themed Levels – Unlock and play levels inspired by the vinyls you collect.

  • 🎺 Submit your music - Send your own music via Discord, and we'll make your vinyls!


    👑 Do you have what it takes to become the ultimate Vinyl God? Start building your collection today!

name: Vinyls

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (Intel HD 3000 or equivalent)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (Intel HD 3000 or equivalent)

short_description: Collect, trade, and showcase your virtual vinyl collection in Vinyl Drop! Open random drops, score rare records, and trade with others on Steam.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Japanese
